entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
